name: supple
content:
supple adjective
(BENDING)
Add to word list
Add to word list
bending or able to be bent easily; not stiff: I'm not supple enough (= my body doesn't bend easily enough) to touch the floor. The gloves were made of very supple leather.

supple adjective
(ABLE TO CHANGE)
literary able to change quickly and successfully to suit different situations: She has shown that she has a supple mind. We need a more supple monetary policy.
